attributes.action: Force Nike & FA to recall the latest England Kit.
attributes.additional_details:
The St George’s Cross is the flag for England and has been for over 800 Years! The population doesn’t want Nike to take it upon themselves to change this on our national team kit.

Dubbed as a “Playful Update” this is a mockery and it isn’t just a flag! You cannot change history!
attributes.background: Instruct Nike & The FA to recall the latest England Kit and restore the original colours to St George’s Cross Flag

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the England football kit are a matter for the Football Association, not the UK Government or Parliament.
